title: Bound Forever
description: The stunning conclusion to Bound by Lies… Kitten Caden and I on the run. Together. But he still won’t let me touch him and he's still keeping things from me. I am determined to uncover everything - at any cost. Even if it tears us apart. Caden Jacob is back. He’s back and he knows about her. Now, everything that binds the three of us together are twisting and tightening, pulling us all together. I can feel the inevitable coming…I don’t know how this will end… all I know is, there will be blood. Romantic suspense. Book two in a two book series.
author: Sienna Blake
